title: Validate SSL Decrypt policy "OS Family"  info icon text as "When access method is Client, or Client is used in combination with other access methods."
custom_steps:
- Login to tenant and go to Policies -> SSL Decryption policy
- click on "New Policy"
- In Match Criteria -> click on Add Criteria
- Select OS Family and few values (such as Windows)
- Verify info icon with text as "When access method is Client, or Client is used in combination with other access methods." (Possibly with help center hyperlink) below OS Family box
custom_expected: There should be INFO icon with text as "When access method is Client, or Client is used in combination with other access methods." (Possibly with help center hyperlink) below OS Family box
